availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Residence: Benton post office, Marshall County, KY. A North Carolina-born farmer. Married Martha Ann Wood. Appointed postmaster of Benton, Marshall County, KY, on 20 Aug 1863.

bibl.p: Ancestry.com. U.S., Appointments of U. S. Postmasters, 1832-1971 [database on-line]. Provo, UT, USA: Ancestry.com Operations, Inc., 2010. Original data: Record of Appointment of Postmasters, 1832-1971. NARA Microfilm Publication, M841, 145 rolls. Records of the Post Office Department, Record Group Number 28. Washington, D.C.: National Archives, Benton, Marshall County, KY, Volume 28, 20 Aug 1863, p. 135.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marshall County, Benton post office, p. 22.

Find A Grave, Entry for Daniel David Thompson (1821-1868), Find A Grave Memorial # 26037578, Thompson Cemetery, Benton, Marshall County, Kentucky, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=88223665&ref=acom (accessed 22 May 2017).
